LanguageData.FlareGun_Random.label: Random Flare Gun
LanguageData.FlareGun_Random.description: Trigger a random event, which may bring you opportunities or dangers.
LanguageData.FlareGun_Truey.label: Flare Gun
LanguageData.FlareGun_Truey.description: To trigger the recorded event, you can modify the event you want to trigger at any time.
